column4: are some of those gui driven firewalls in the packages that you can easily install?
so it is in the packages. I thought installing software was point and click
It is, but there's multiple avenues for installing things
Not like pasting a command into the terminal is hard or something ;)
it is for my brother. he has been on windoze all his life
so you could do it point and click as well right?
Just tell him to go to applications > accessories > terminal, and paste
Yes, he could open Synaptic and install it that way
i thought ubuntu has that intall new software button
There's lots of ways of installing things. If you go to Add/remove programs on the applications menu and search for "Firestarter" i'm sure you could install it that way too
my brother calles editing a config file programing haha
ubuntu says it is linux for human beings. well my brother will be a god test case hahahahahaha
